cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, this creature deals damage equal to the number of permanents you sacrificed this turn to any target.

When this artifact enters, put a flying counter on target creature or Vehicle you control.
{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

When this creature enters, search your library for a Junk card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Whenever a Junk you control enters, target player mills two cards.

When this artifact enters, tap target creature and put a stun counter on it.
{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

When this artifact enters, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

When this artifact enters, you may discard a card. If you do, create a tapped Treasure token.
{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Some of the best junk is in people's houses.”
—Kinsley, Badlands Outcast[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When this artifact enters, target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

Menace
Whenever Junklord Vorrick enters or attacks, create a Junk token. Then you may sacrifice three artifacts. If you do, Junklord Vorrick deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
[i]Hoot n' Holler[/i] — Whenever Rippen, the Scarred or a Vehicle he crewed this turn attacks, you may pay {X}, where X is Rippen's power. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Rippen.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“We are the notches in the blade.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Mercenary creature token with haste. That token must attack this turn if able.
During your turn, Mercenaries you control get +1/+0 for each other Mercenary you control.

When you cast your next spell this turn, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. If you copied a permanent spell this way, exile that token at the beginning of your next end step. [i](Copies of permanent spells become tokens.)[/i]
Jump-start

When Marus, Calculated Killer enters, create Louie, a legendary 3/3 black Construct artifact creature.
Whenever you attack, target token creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

Call The Beast. Then you gain life equal to the total number of creature cards in your graveyard and that you own in exile. [i](You get a Call The Beast emblem if you don't have one. You may mill three cards. Then choose one of the emblem's abilities.)[/i]

First strike, vigilance, trample, indestructible
Tap six untapped creatures you control: Put X +1/+1 counters on VAL, where X is the total power of creatures tapped this way. VAL becomes an artifact creature. Activate only as a sorcery and only once. [i](This effect lasts indefinitely.)[/i]
When this creature dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Where Wrenchmar's natural fauna ends and its mechanical horrors begin is the kind of debate that no Junker has time for.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, this creature gains menace until end of turn.
{2}{G}: This creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.

Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. Rig Sparks deals 1 damage to any target.
Jump-start [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)[/i]

Menace
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library. Until end of turn, you may cast that card and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.

Flash
When this creature enters, choose a creature card name that isn't Lost Sea Watcher. Return all creatures with the chosen name to their owner's hands.
Creature spells with the chosen name can't be cast.

Choose one — 
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I can never remember which wire to cut. Yanking on all of them usually does the trick though.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When this enchantment enters, create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.
Whenever one or more creatures you control enter, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature and each Vehicle you control. Artifact creatures and Vehicles you control gain haste until end of turn.

When this enchantment enters and whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
{2}{W}: Scry 1.

Whenever you call The Beast, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
{3}{U}, {T}: Call The Beast. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.rules_text:
Choose two —
• Destroy all creatures.
• Each player discards their hand, then draws a card for each card they discarded this way.
• Return up to two target Vehicle cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Opponents can't cast noncreature spells until your next turn.

Choose two —
• Destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less.
• Target opponent discards two cards unless they discard an artifact card.
• Call The Beast.
• Return an artifact or creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

Deathtouch

{4}, {T}, Exile The Junklord's Gambit: Exile each nonland permanent with mana value equal to or less than the number of charge on this artifact. Then if there were ten or more charge counters on this artifact you win the game. Activate only as a sorcery.
